room_title: Escape room "Vaccine" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We did the Vaccine room with 6 people and had a fantastic time. We will definitely be looking to go back and do another room with them.

room_title: Escape room "Vaccine" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We have done several escape rooms in the past but this one was the most fun yet! I loved everything about it. We did the Vaccine. The staff was great, the room was great, the twists and puzzles were a challenge and a lot of fun! I highly recommend it and can't wait to go back and try one of the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Vaccine" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We had a great time! Vaccine was a terrific escape room.

room_title: Escape room "Vaccine" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We went as part of our Moms Night Out and tried Vaccine. We had the BEST time and we escaped! The staff was professional and fun, the game was very well put together and we cannot wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Vaccine" by Escape Experience - Nashville Escape Games in Nashville
review: We did the Vaccine scenario. This is a very challenging and fun time. There are dozens of puzzles and each one brings its own challenges. Will was an amazing host. He knew how to help us along to avoid frustration, but not just give the answers away. Great time! Just remember, it is hard so bring your thinking caps.
